title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs       For park news, contact Public Affairs Specialist Dana Dierkes via e-mail or by phone--559-565-3131. For information about the fire program in the parks, contact Fire Information and Education Specialist Mike Theune via e-mail or by phone at 559-565-3703.
